front.title: Conformity Statement of Mobile IPv6 Hierarchical Paging to RFC 3154

abstract.t: This document states the conformity of Mobile IPv6 Hierarchical Paging (MIPv6HP) protocol I-D to RFC 3154 on Requirements and Functional Architecture for an IP Host Alerting Protocol. It is stated to which clauses MIPv6HP fully conforms and to which clauses close to full conformance is claimed. The clauses of RFC 3154 to which MIPv6HP does not conform are claried.
